text: Serra da Capivara Airport is the airport serving São Raimundo Nonato, Brazil. It is named after Serra da Capivara National Park. It is operated by Esaero. ==History== The airport was inaugurated on 27 October 2015. ==Airlines and destinations== No scheduled flights operate at this airport. ==Access== The airport is located from downtown São Raimundo Nonato. ==See also== *List of airports in Brazil ==References== ==External links== * * * * Category:Airports in Piauí
title: São Raimundo Nonato Airport
